title: 31c08. Layover or on-call time of drivers and helpers.
text:
(a)  
IB785.15, 785.16, and 785.17 are
applicable to layover or on-call time of truck drivers and helpers. It makes no
difference whether such employees are at home or at some other location. (b)  
(On the other hand, the travel
time rule stated in IB 785.39 does not apply to such employees even if they are
away from home overnight but applies only to employees who, as passengers on an
airplane, train, boat, bus or automobile engage in travel which keeps them away
from home overnight. (However, see FOH 31b09.) ADD the following new Sec to

(a)   IB785.15, 785.16, and 785.17 are applicable to layover or on-call time of truck drivers and helpers. It makes no difference whether such employees are at home or at some other location.

 

(b)   (On the other hand, the travel time rule stated in IB 785.39 does not apply to such employees even if they are away from home overnight but applies only to employees who, as passengers on an airplane, train, boat, bus or automobile engage in travel which keeps them away from home overnight. (However, see FOH 31b09.)
